server

Class HostServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.HostServer

  • public class HostServer
extends java.lang.Object
    A multithreaded host server which handles client connections and runs the game.
    Version:
    1.0 - December 20th 2023
    Author:
    Harry Xu
